entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 70%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon with 70 percent chance of showers later this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 near noon. High 12. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Friday 15 April 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to periods of snow after midnight and ending before morning then partly cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Friday 15 April 2022
